name: Format boolean values
func:
var maxTempAir = msg.payload.MaxTempAir
var targetTempAir = msg.payload.TargetTempAir
var minTempAir = msg.payload.MinTempAir
var currentTempAir = msg.payload.CurrentTempAir


msg.payload = {
    "MaxTempAir": maxTempAir,
    "TargetTempAir": targetTempAir,
    "MinTempAir": minTempAir,
    "CurrentTempAir": currentTempAir
}



return msg;

name: Format boolean values

var currentHum = msg.payload.CurrentHum


msg.payload = {

name: merge
func:
msg.payload = { ...msg.payload.tempAirData, ...msg.payload.humData, ...msg.payload.vpdData, ...msg.payload.co2Data }
return msg;

name: Area Switch
delay
func:
var intervalDuration = msg.payload.IntervalDuration * 1000;

setTimeout(() => {return msg;}, intervalDuration);

name: merge
func:

return msg;
